songs.lyrics:
Turiya turiya jaanda, tere mode te bandook ve
Turiya turiya jaanda, tere mode te bandook ve
Khich ke na maari, saadi zindagi malook ve
Khich ke na maari, saadi zindadi malook ve

(BADSHAH)
Yeh jo kahani maine tum ko sunani hain
Purani jani manni sunni kayio ki jubani hain
Banda banta tez lekin kudrat badi siyani hain
Jisne thuka hai muh pe us ne
Muh ki hi khani hain
Ab ghor se sun meri har ik baat
Kaam tere hi vo aayega
Tu jo bhi karega upperwala
Tere hisse main likhta jayega jo bhi khoyega
Wohi payega jo bhi boyega wohi khayega
Tu duniya ko jo dega wahi
Wapis duniya se tujhko aayega
Sukh payega jo tu jhe baat ye rat gayi
Kamyabi ka shot kat layi
Kitno ki zindagiyuhi kat gayi
Acha acho ki g**de fat gayi
Tu kya cheej hai itna bta
Kya teri aukat hain
Aage khuda ke
Kisse bda banna chahta hain apne aapko bda bta ke
Loot ke logo ko bna tu rich boy
Uske hatho main triggter
Na de vo kich boy
Meri salha tujhe bas yehi hain ke
Soch samjh ke kario jo bhi karna
Coz karma is a bitch boy

Tureya tureya janda tere modd’e te bandook ve
Kich ke na mari saddi zindagi malook ve

(RAXSTAR)
Modeh tungi dunali kisse toh darda nahin
Hasda nahin, Marna nahin?
What about the pistol tere dushman kol?
Hun fasgaya be
Bullet te behke londah gera
Bullet uthe naa likwaya tera
Kichke tere pichhe ohna marna while you sit there

What you think you can hide from
Anything that you ain't got your eyes on?
Every action has a reaction and that's the truth that you should base your life on
But you lie to yourself, take selfies and hide from yourself
You could try buy some help but you'll never lose karma inside your wealth
It'll find its way to you, I could pray for you
Find an Angel to say that they're gonna protect you
But you did what you done now there's no way I ain't saving you
What to do? Ki kartha tu?
Player tu banna chonda si now you're screaming out I need a substitute
What to do? Ki kartha tu?
Player tu banna chonda si now you're screaming out I need a substitute
Got a crew that'll rep you, enemies want to end you
Samajh na aveh menu menu
Kuriyan sariyan kendiya tenu

Turiya turiya jaanda, tere mode te bandook ve
Turiya turiya jaanda, tere mode te bandook ve
Khich ke na maari, saadi zindagi malook ve
Khich ke na maari, saadi zindadi malook ve
songs.title: Bandook
